app.long_description:
# SortMii This visualizes sorting algorithms on your Wii.
## Algorithms - Bubble Sort - Cocktail Shaker Sort \(incorrectly listed as Cocktail Sort because it would go off the screen if I didn't\) - Gnome Sort - Insertion Sort
## Controls - D-Pad Up and Down to increase/decrease array size - D-Pad Left and Right to switch between algorithms
## Special Thanks - GRRLIB - DevKitPro/PPC team - The Sound of Sorting
